title: The Loans (National Savings Boonds) Act

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Act may be cited as the Loans (National Savings Short title.
Bonds) Act.

provisions.content:
2. In this Act-                                                   Interpretas

    “Prize Fund” means the fund established under

        with bonds.
